Who We Are

For 175 years, people have worked with New York Life to protect their families and futures. We believe in the importance of human guidance and in trusted relationships built on being there when our customers need us most.

Meeting you wherever you are on your life journey.

Whether you’re just starting out, juggling family and career, or approaching retirement—you can rely on our experience to help you make the right decisions. 

Getting married

When you merge your personal and financial lives, you may be figuring out how to protect each other now and in the future. You can customize a plan that evolves with you.

Learn more

Learn more

Growing your family

Now is the time to consider how to protect your family and plan for your financial needs in the years to come. We can help you protect your biggest assets and can also give you access to funds if your family needs them for things like home renovations or college tuition.

Learn more

Learn more

Planning for retirement

How do you make sure that you’ll have the income you need as you head into retirement? You may want to consider a policy that lets you maintain your lifestyle, helps you save, helps cover some costs for extended periods of care, or provides a stream of income when you retire.

Learn more

Learn more

You’re here for all the right reasons. With the right information, the rest should be easy.

Work with a company that believes in the power of doing good.

Key tips for first-time life insurance buyers.

Learn the basics of life insurance and why it is so important.

See why moving day is a good time to re-evaluate your financial strategy.

 

Questions people ask:

Life Insurance

When is the right time to buy life insurance? Am I too young? Too old?

Life insurance can play an important role in your financial security at any stage of life. Starting sooner allows you to save more and gives you more budget-friendly options.

How do I determine what kind of insurance is best for my life?

It all depends on your needs. If you’re looking for immediate protection without committing to a permanent policy now, you may want to consider term life. If you need a versatile policy to protect your loved ones and give you cash value that you can access, think about whole life.*

I have a limited budget. What are my life insurance options?

We have many options for both temporary and permanent life insurance policies—many people select a combination of both to fit within their budget. 

Do I need individual life insurance if I’m enrolled in a plan through my employer?

Many insurance plans provided by employers still leave a financial gap. Our financial professionals can work with you to determine exactly what you need.

Planning for Retirement

What role can insurance play in retirement?

Not only can insurance protect you, you can also use its cash value to provide a supplemental income stream if your life insurance needs decrease in retirement.*

What if my priorities change in retirement? What products can help?

Many life insurance policies offer cash value that you can access in retirement.* Guaranteed income products, which are called income annuities, can help maintain your income, so you can use your other savings on things like travel and spending time with your family. 

Can life insurance and long term care insurance help protect my assets in retirement?

Yes, both help protect your assets. Life insurance can allow you to tap into your cash if you need it. Long term care insurance can help fund expenses related to costs for extended periods of care. 

Why New York Life?

What’s unique about being a New York Life client?

Being a New York Life client means that you get the benefit of working with our financial professionals, who will partner with you for life. Our clients are also backed by a company with a long history and notable financial strength—that’s the type of security and track record you can rely on.

How do I know New York Life has my best interest in mind?

New York Life is a mutual company. We answer to policy owners—not to Wall Street. That means that your interests and our interests are aligned. 

What are the benefits of working with a financial professional versus online?

We believe in the value of human guidance. Life insurance, retirement, and financial products can be complex. Our financial professionals are highly trained and have access to the latest tools and resources to guide you throughout your life as your needs change. They will work directly with you to simplify matters and help you achieve your short- and long-term goals.

Does working with a New York Life financial professional cost me anything?

Getting started doesn’t cost anything. Just connect with one of our financial professionals to discuss your needs. Together, you can clarify your financial position, goals, and aspirations and co-create a plan to ensure you’re prepared for whatever life may bring. Our financial professionals can give you a good sense of how much various solutions cost, so you can make the best decisions for you.

Connect with a financial professional

Customize a plan that works best for you.

Go
